Package info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.controller

Class CustomerViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.ryandorman.simplescheduler.controller.CustomerViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class CustomerViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Handles the logic associated with a detailed display of Customer data for creating or updating a Customer.

        resourceBundle - null

      • initData

        public void initData​(javafx.stage.Stage currentStage,
                     int selectedCustomerId)
        Allows a an existing Customer to be populated into the form for updating. If the Customer does not exist the modal will close.
        Parameters:
        currentStage - Reference to the Current modal stage
        selectedCustomerId - Unique identifier of the Customer to be updated

      • onSave

        public void onSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Handles Customer update or creation based on form input field values.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Event triggered by Save button

      • onCancel

        public void onCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Handles cancel of current Customer update or create and closes the modal.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - Event triggered by cancel button

      • setupCountryComboBox

        private void setupCountryComboBox()
        Sets up the Country combo box with the current Country options. Lambdas increase readability and ease of mapping Country records to options for the combo box.

      • setupDivisionComboBox

        private void setupDivisionComboBox​(int countryId)
        Sets up the First Level Division combo box for the specified Country. Lambdas increase readability and ease of mapping First Level Division records to options for the combo box.
        Parameters:
        countryId - Unique identifier for the Country to filter divisions by
